comment: IET 4151- Good class and follows the schedule. I will try to take other classes with this professor.
Overall, the course was VERY test heavy which makes it hard to make mistakes. She was a nice teacher but was a tough grader.
She's laid back. Nice professor to take. Exams are tricky but study the HW and quizzes and every source given

Dr. Pooyan is a great professor who teaches good lectures and wants you to succeed. She's assessable outside of class and is willing to work with you. If you try, you will get an A. Just note for ISYE 4250, there is a book you have to read and be tested on at the end of the semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria

comment: Great professor who makes this class a breeze. She is very flexible/accessible and lectures are good. HW/Quizzes seem fairly easy and also provide feedback on how to correctly solve. Tests align with material presented and you have an option to take online/in-person. Do not need to attend lectures to do well. I would 100% recommend.
